author: Staff Reporter
text:
The airport now has a facility that would treat passengers with diabetes and hypertension for free. The facility, run by Eris life sciences, a pharmaceutical company, was opened at the domestic terminal on Tuesday.

“This will mainly help in treating urgent cases. We hope people make the best use of it,” said Deepak Shastri, Chennai Airport Director, who inaugurated the centre.

—staff reporter
title: Diabetes care at Chennai airport
